Hanaa is a senior journalism and Spanish Language and Literature major PERIOD After coming to Stony Brook Hanaa decided she wanted to explore print and online media after previously working in radio PERIOD She joined The Statesman in the fall of her freshman year and became an assistant editor that spring PERIOD She hopes to use her language and multimedia skills to travel and someday work for a Spanishlanguage publication in either Spain or South America PERIOD Contact Hanaa at emailprotected PERIOD
